thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Cathedral of Stone

title: Cathedral of Stone
text:
(85527) 2015-08-06 23:40 
Hello alexandre, How strange the weather is, so much rain in Brazil! But you were lucky here with the weather. We now have a wave of very hot weather, 38 deg. I rather stay home. beautiful cathedral in Gothic style. Interesting colourful stones. WArm regards MAlgo (9425) 2015-08-07 0:15 
Bonjour, You have found a very favorable point of view to show this cathedral in all its beauty. Excellent composition, wonderful light and perfect quality of the image! cordialement lousat (81904) 2015-08-07 1:11 
Ciao Alex,it's curious to see a cathedral made in this nordic style in Brazil.A great capture,well sharp and very bright,and with the sun is better as i can read in your note...ehehe....very well done! Have a nice weekend and thanks,Luciano
